meanings.sent1: The smooth surface of the nailless board was safe for children to play on.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter used a nailless hammer to avoid damaging the delicate wood.
meanings.sent3: The nailless shelf confused the handyman, who kept looking for a place to hang his tools.
meanings.sent4: Her nailless fingers danced gracefully across the piano keys, producing a beautiful melody.
meanings.sent5: The nailless shoes allowed him to move silently through the house like a ghost.

meanings.sent1: The nailless picture frame hung securely on the wall with adhesive strips.
meanings.sent2: She preferred the nailless method of hanging decorations to avoid damaging the paint.
meanings.sent3: The nailless cat tree puzzled the kitten, who couldn't figure out how to climb it.
meanings.sent4: The nailless robot hand delicately picked up the fragile glass ornament.
meanings.sent5: The nailless construction of the birdhouse made it easy to assemble without tools.
